entry.title: My Beloved Ghost and Me.
entry.summary:
Author: daggerandrosie

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 47,254Chapters: 8/16Kudos: 30

Summary: “Listen Buckley, I need you to know that this whole…” The officer gestured to his' clothes. “Gothics United Against Following Curfew club you're a part of can end up real bad, you can die kid. Or worse, go to jail.”Buck doesn't think he looks much like a goth, aside from wearing black, and he only does it because it's easier to sneak around like that, there's nothing about him… Scratch that. Officer Gallagher just found him lurking around the cemetery at two in the morning. Because he talks to ghosts.Always have and probably always will.It fucking sucks.It sucks. so. bad.And now he has one. A ghost. In his room. A very handsome one at that, an old cowboy with a cowboy hat, tight pants, boots and big brown eyes.Buck is so, so, very fucked

entry.title: too loud in my own head
entry.summary:
Author: bryspamw

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 6Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: After dropping the lawsuit, Buck returns to the 118 expecting tension.. but not the silence. His team, his family, now barely look at him. Whispers follow him like shadows, but no one talks to him. No one asks how he’s doing. Broke, alone, and filled with shame, Buck moves into a rundown apartment where the walls are thin and the cold feels permanent. Most nights, dinner is whatever he can find under five dollars. His smile is long gone. And after a while, Buck starts to believe that maybe things would be better if he just… disappeared.

entry.title: Ghost
entry.summary:
Author: BuddieTillTheDayWeDie

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 22,924Chapters: 4/13Kudos: 50

Summary: Evan has always been invisible, a shadow in a world that never cared to notice him. Born into neglect and shaped by abuse, he carries the scars of his childhood, spent yearning for love that never came. With every rejection, every cruel word directed at him, the gaping hole grew in his soul, cementing its place. As the years dragged on, the boy who once begged to be seen, learnt there was no point. Instead he hid in plain sight, retreating into the comfort, the numbness in his pain.Darkness has a way of festering, and Evan’s coping mechanisms become his cage. With each wound, he edges closer to a breaking point, a moment of no return, where despair threatens to consume him entirely. Inspired by the narrative of Ghost by Badflower, we delve into Evan’s story, his thoughts, feelings, and the depths of his despair, woven through the lens of mental illness. Eventually, he slips past that breaking point. It’s no longer just about surviving the ghosts of his past; it’s about deciding whether he will let them take over for good.

entry.title: I can't say anything to your face, because look at that face (gorgeous)
entry.summary:
Author: Hayden_the_hufflepuff

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,767Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 47

Summary: Buck sprints down the stairs, heading for the locker room. Out of the corner of his eye he sees Hen shake her head.“What?” He asks her. She snorts. “Seriously, What?” Eddie asks again.“The chances of you being productive or helpful for the rest of the shift just fell off a cliff, Eddie.” She says in that tone that implies that she knows something.Eddie’s face twists in genuine confusion. “What do you mean?” He asks. She just snorts again.“You’ll see,” Hen shakes her head again. “You’ll see.”Now, It’s twenty minutes later, and Eddie is starting to understand what Hen was saying. It’s just that…. Jesus, Buck looks fucking Obscene like that.-OR--Buck borrows Eddie's Shirt and Eddie goes through serval stages of grief about it

entry.title: And I've been meaning to tell you, I think your house is haunted.
entry.summary:
Author: Idachen

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,970Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 81

Summary: He had grown up competing with him.Daniel, the perfect son, who died young and left only idealized memories behind.Daniel, who became more than a brother. He became an altar. A legend.His parents didn’t just mourn Daniel. They worshipped him.And they measured Buck against him every single day of his life.He was never enough. Never quiet enough, never smart enough, never obedient enough. His every breath seemed to offend them.It wasn’t Daniel’s fault he died. Buck knew that.But some part of him—some furious, aching part—hated Daniel for it. or Buck doesn't talk much about his childhood, and Maddie doesn't either. There are several reasons that Buck doesn't like to think about. However, when his parents come to visit him in LA and it triggers his childhood trauma again, it might finally be time to confront it. (I'm bad at summaries)(*Updated* name changed, after obssesing with seven-taylor swift on 15.6)

entry.title: The Kendall Calendar
entry.summary:
Author: Jvp1t3rthyf4g

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,572Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 2

Summary: Maddie's eyes widen as she sees a face shes tried so hard to forget. Even worse is the fact that her boyfriend is just casually chatting with him, as if he hadn't helped her through panic attacks because of him."Mads, you okay?" Her brother's voice echoes through her head."Please tell me I'm not hallucinating, Buck." She whispers so quiet, Buck almost doesn't hear her. she points at the man. The husband she had left, escaped, just chatting with her new partner."Is that... Doug?"

entry.title: All the Signs I Missed
entry.summary:
Author: IdoGeek

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,566Chapters: 7/13Kudos: 188

Summary: It’s not a whisper, not exactly. It’s just… matter-of-fact. Like saying it out loud isn’t the hard part. Like waiting for a reaction is.The words drop between them, sudden and small, but precise.Eddie blinks, caught mid-step.“What?”Buck searches his face. Something subtle shifts behind his eyes. “Wait… you didn’t know?”There’s no accusation in it. Just confusion. Like it never occurred to him that Eddie wouldn’t know.Eddie stares, his brain a beat behind his body. “No, I—I didn’t.” OR Buck is trans and out. So out, that most people don't think about it anymore. So when Eddie joins the 118, no one mentions it. The question is, how long will it be, until Eddie finds out? finished and will be updated daily

entry.title: Hold Me Close, Let Me Forget
entry.summary:
Author: Madforyou

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,468Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 39

Summary: “Ohmygod,” he breathes out, eyes wide as he comes back to himself. He isn’t sure how long he has been staring into space, but when he looks at Buck he can see it’s been a minute.“Eddie what the hell is going on with you?” it comes out as a whisper, but his eyes shoot up to meet the blondes, concern etching Buck’s already sharp features.He isn’t sure what comes over him but the next minute he is pushing his best friend in the world out the door, ignoring his protests, saying they will talk later, and shutting the door in his face as he slides down it, head in his hands. Thoughts ruthlessly swirling in his mind as he races to make sense of the situation. Does he have feelings for Buck?or; Eddie and Buck hookup after getting too drunk at Chimney's bachelor party, Buck doesn't seem to remember and Eddie spirals about it.

entry.title: Trauma Buddies
entry.summary:
Author: Pnk_strawberry1

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,043Chapters: 1/5Kudos: 5

Summary: What was supposed to be just one night off turns into a nightmare.May Grant is burned out, between school, dispatch, and pressure, she needs to breathe. A night out feels harmless. When Maddie suggests reaching out to an old friend, May texts Eddie Diaz, her former dispatch partner and the closest thing she has to a big brother.Eddie, fresh back from Texas and feeling like everything’s changed--including Buck, agrees. Maybe they both need a break.But the night spirals when a girl from a past dispatch call resurfaces, first charming, then possessive, then violent making the duo run and even have to fight to get away from her.OrMay just needed one night off. Eddie just needed to get out of his thoughts, so they go out together to a bar.But when a girl from a past dispatch call resurfaces with dangerous intentions, May and Eddie find themselves in a fight for their lives.

entry.title: Where The World Ends (And You Begin)
entry.summary:
Author: buckmeetsboy

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 33,548Chapters: 11/22Kudos: 21

Summary: So here, where light begins to shatter— where gods forget to see— I offer all I have left: my love, my blood, my me. There’s a prophecy. A Prince. A bond that was never supposed to happen.Buck didn’t ask to be chosen. Eddie never meant to fall in love.But the Veil is breaking, and the only thing louder than destiny is the sound of Buck’s name in Eddie’s mouth.
